alert.note: Alert for Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tioga, western Susquehanna, northwestern Luzerne, eastern Bradford and Wyoming Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lockwood to North Towanda to Sweet Valley. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Falls, Muhlenberg, Barton, Vernon, Sayre, Waverly, Rush, Owego, Lehman and Athens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms.
